scripts.testcases-allure: npx cypress run --spec ./cypress/integration/testcases/*.js --browser chrome --reporter mocha-allure-reporter --env allure=true
scripts.generate-allurereports: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
scripts.finaltest: npm run testcases && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.finaltest-allure: npm run testcases-allure && npm run generate-allurereports
